Description.Text: Equipment:Air Conditioning, Shower and Jacuzzi with hydro massage, Bathrobes and slippers, TV flat screen (satellite), DVD, Stereo System, Safe, Fireplace, Phone, Fridge, Private balcony, Wireless internet, Hairdryer, Heating, Cosmetics and other bath amenities. Living room, Spa.
Just 22 km from Volos, situated next to Milies, Afissos and Kala Nera, it is a place of natural beauty.
